title: Update to v2.9.0 Beta 2
description: Customizable wallpapers, shared folders and more
changelog:
Colorgram was updated to version 2.9.0 Beta 2. What's new?
• Show username on title bar
• Delete account

• Fixed incorrect app restart popup
• Fixed missing info sections in groups
• Fixed blocked channels after click any button
• Fixed in-message translator not working
• Fixed folder icons not showing
• Fixed folders crash
• Fixed Quick Reaction working in scheduled messages
